identify.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to recognize and correctly name someone or something
identify.translation[0].definitions[0].e: He was too far away to be able to identify faces.
The police took fingerprints and identified the body.
Eyewitnesses identified the gunman as an army sergeant.
The aircraft were identified as American.
identify.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to recognize something or discover exactly what it is, what its nature or origin is etc
identify.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Scientists have identified the gene that causes abnormal growth.
They identified a number of problem areas.
identify.translation[0].definitions[2].d: if a particular thing identifies someone or something, it makes them easy to recognize
identify.translation[0].definitions[2].e: His accent identified him as a Frenchman.
